title: I was meant to be promoted
body: i was meant to be promoted from b2 into b1 but now i am on 83LP after rank ques were disabled.

replies.body:
Hi MrMitch

Thanks for letting us know about this - sucks to hear you had this issue.

We did have some issues with Ranked yesterday which caused some weird errors like this for a few players.  Riot Gehirn has a post with a [detailed explanation here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/dbkjXlyL-known-issue-ranked-lp-gains-not-correct) if you wanna read it.

Unfortunately we're unable to fix the missed LP / promos retroactively.  With the way the LP system works though, it will balance out in the long run as you keep playing :)

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi Mindstar 

I have read the post and i understand i am now in my promos to silver and it seems to getting fixed and i hope something like this doesn't happen again.
